不好意思
乱入问一下...

蓬佩奥西点军校毕业是以全班第一名还是1986届第一名？
抱歉我英文不好

https://edition. cnn.com/2018/05/21/us/mike-pompeo-fast-facts/index.html
这里是这样写的
Graduated first in his class at West Point Military Academy.


这里的class是说一个班级的意思还是同一届的意思？

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_United_States_Military_Academy_top-ranking_graduates
然后这里的列表
1986
Mike Pompeo
Captain

resigned in 1991, formerly served as Director of the Central Intelligence Agency. Currently serving as United States Secretary of State.
